info.name: host
info.description: The active directory server name or IP address.

info.name: port
info.description: The active directory server port. Defaults to '389'.

info.name: base
info.description: A default LDAP treebase for searching the server. Example: 'DC=kineticdata,DC=com'.

info.name: username
info.description: The distinguised name of the user that will interact with the active directory server. Example: 'CN=Administrator,CN=Users,DC=kineticdata,DC=com'

info.name: password
info.description: The password of the user that will be used to interact with the active directory server.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enables debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
